titleInfo.title: History of KWTO - Wayne Glenn - part 3

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Part 3 of a radio segment titled the History Of KWTO, announced by Wayne Glenn, featuring various events, facts, and recorded excerpts relating to radio station KWTO (Springfield, Mo.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
